metadata.title: CVE-2022-3565 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in LinuxKernel. Affected by this issue is the function del_timer of the filedrivers/isdn/mISDN/l1oip_core.c of the component Bluetooth. Themanipulation leads to use after free. It is recommended to apply a patch tofix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211088.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
